casebody.data:
Helen J. ZABOR, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. Jean SIEJAK, Defendant-Appellant. No. 228, Docket 22986. United States Court of Appeals Second Circuit. Argued May 6, 1954. Decided May 13, 1954. George E. Phillies, Buffalo, N. Y. (Phillies & Sandoro, Buffalo, N. Y., on the brief), for plaintiff-appellee. Nathan A. Borkowski, Buffalo, N. Y. (Ansley B. Borkowski, Buffalo, N. Y., on the brief), for defendant-appellant.

Before CLARK, FRANK and MEDINA, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Affirmed on the opinion of District Judge Knight below, Zabor v. United States, D.C.W.D.N.Y., 113 F.Supp. 287.
